name: Abyss深淵
description:
"Abyss" is a first-person narrative game in which players take on the role of the protagonist, Red, to investigate the abnormal events that occurred at an abandoned facility in the mountains.

The protagonist is a team called SCR Special Forces, they are experts in dealing with such incidents, and they are sent to various places to deal with abnormal incidents


Red, whose identity and origin are unknown, is the only person in the world who has the ability to control dark strings. Although she has great strength, her personality is still like a child, and he often forgets work when he is willful or playful

Therefore, two team members Blade and Dragon need to take care of her. Red is always accompanied by a bunch of strange creatures called LinkZi. They will follow her around and play with her, and they have cartoon-like mischief abilities.

Dragon, the big sister with a gentle personality, plays the role of communication and coordination in the team, and always takes care of things very well, with a dragon-shaped "container" around her, which seems to be the product of the influence of the dark string
Love that Red treats herself like a big sister and has a strong doting...it seems to be related to the dragon's sad past

Blade, with a seemingly cold personality but a soft heart, plays the role of an attacker in the team. In the past, it was a product of kawaryo Group's experiment. Can cut down tall buildings with one cut.
Although she often plays and quarrels with Red, she will still silently accept Red's unreasonable demands, and wants to protect her and find the value of her existence

What is Red's experience and past? Why can she see other worlds and connect to other worlds?
The game will take Red as the main axis, telling her story

Story Background



Abyss describes the sudden appearance of a huge abyss in the future world, and the mysterious substance [Dark String] that appeared afterwards changed the whole world

The magical power possessed by the dark string...as if it is connecting something that does not belong to this world

And some people were affected by the dark string and turned into monsters or caused abnormal phenomena, but there were also very few cases who became "returners" with powerful abilities

The world is controlled by the five major groups headed by enterprises, and many groups and organizations have emerged in various places, each with its own unique technology

The world is gradually changing and falling apart, and the key to all this seems to have something to do with Red, because she is the only existence that can control the dark string

How to play


The game is primarily a first-person walking simulator with exploration and dialogue mechanics
The player plays the role of Red to investigate the strange phenomenon of the destination, and connect with it, travel through various worlds and the past
While watching the plot, perform simple puzzle-solving levels, and experience some scary pictures

Featured


  • Use dark strings
Use the ability to connect to unlock traps or find clues

Connection: Can connect two related things (ex. conducting flames, moving objects, etc.)
Swing: can swing and move at a specific fixed point
Spying: Can see things in different worlds, use them as a barrier, or a place to move, or read the text in their depths


  • Investigation
Talk to the npc you meet on the map
and understand what drives the storyline


  • Explore
Explore the abandoned facility freely, and possibly uncover hidden secrets, as well as find collectibles
